setting.conf_description:
Very Simple.
ON = Yes
OFF = No
If on, person on the recieving hand of a transaction will recieve a pm notification.
Send A PM To The Member That Has Had Their Points Edited Through The iPoints System?
Turn the donation portion of the system off. If this is set to no, no one can donate to anyone else.
The bank system that is built in and whether it should be on or not
Rate of interest for points in the bank.
Turn Global Shop On/Off.
Allow members to purchase avatar permission? If this is off, they get it automatically.
How much to charge for this permission?
Allow members to purchase signature permission? If this is off, they get it automatically.
How much to charge for this permission.
Can A Member Change His/Her Display Name?
How Much To Charge To Change Display Name? (Whole Numbers)
Custom Member Title.
Cost To Change Member Title.
Allow One Member To Change Another Member's Title.
How Much To Purchase This Item?
Turn Lottery System On/Off.
When this is on, whoever wins the lottery will receive an automated private message.
ID of the member that the automated PM will come from. Some sites may elect to create a member titled Lotto_Bot to do this.
Amount Of Points Each Lottery Ticket Cost.
Base Amount That A Member Can Win.
Limit The Number Of Tickets Each Member Can Purchase Per Drawing.

language.text: You do not have permission to edit your avatar.
You do not have permission to edit your signature.

component.com_description: Points + Points Transfer System Including Individual & Global Transactions Tables.

table.name: points_log
table.data: editedby_id mediumint(11) NOT NULL default '0', member_id mediumint(11) NOT NULL default '0', opoints int(11) NOT NULL default '0', npoints int(11) NOT NULL default '0', obank int(11) NOT NULL default '0', nbank int(11) NOT NULL default '0', time int(10) NOT NULL default '0', reason varchar(255) default NULL

table.name: transactions
table.data: tid int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, sentfrom mediumint(8) NOT NULL default '0', sentto mediumint(8) NOT NULL default '0', amount int(11) NOT NULL default '0', reason varchar(255) default NULL, time int(10) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`tid`), KEY sentfrom (`sentfrom`)

table.name: lotto_champs
table.data: round int(10) NOT NULL auto_increment, c_id int(10) NOT NULL default '0', c_amount int(20) NOT NULL default '0', time int(10) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`round`), KEY c_id (`c_id`)

table.name: lotto
table.data: m_id int(10) NOT NULL default '0', ticket_price int(10) NOT NULL default '0', round int(10) NOT NULL default '0', time int(10) NOT NULL default '0'
